about_the_game:
Femdom Game World - is a fascinating series of video games, the story centers on strong and sexy women who exercise dominance over men and more. In these games, players are immersed in a world where female domination reigns in all aspects of relationships, providing a unique gaming experience. Experience an exciting world of lust and depravity in Femdom Game World.



Story:

Tyler, sharing an apartment with his stepmother and father, became her slave servant when his father was away on business trips. The stepmother used her dominance to force him to fulfill all her whims, including erotic ones. Tyler submitted to her will, crawling on his knees at her feet and obeying her every command. Stepmother did not limit herself to these obediences: she required Tyler to perform erotic tasks as well. He was forced to do whatever the stepmother wanted him to do, and this included painting his nails, jerking off in front of her, kneeling, and receiving a paddle flogging. In this way, the stepmother took complete control over Tyler, making him her dependent slave. Tyler found himself in a situation where he was completely submissive to his stepmother and willing to do her every command, even if it went against his own wishes.



Key Features:

Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
Quality Animation: Enjoy detailed and high quality sex animations.
Cool soundtrack: Discover the atmosphere of the game with an emotionally rich soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and contains sexually explicit material that some viewers may find offensive. The game contains sexual violence and BDSM. All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old.

name: Femdom Game World: Stepmother

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Femdom Game World : Stepmother is a visual novel with an intense plot, aimed at an adult audience. The player gets into the role of a young boy who shares an uneasy relationship with his stepmother. Their relationship is full of pranks, in which he enjoys playing the role of his stepmother's slave.
supported_languages: English, French, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
